name: Slime Skater
description:
Discover the strange things that happen when you cause slimes to join together.

Slime Skater offers two modes:

  • Adventure Mode: Make slimes carefully join together and make your way through the level
  • Endless Score Mode: Aim for a high score! The more slimes joined together, the more points they award when defeated

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Move
  • Left-Click or Space: Swing your yo-yo to Push Slimes
  • Right-Click or Left Shift: Swing your yo-yo to Break Slimes Apart

This project was made in Unity 2019.3.15 for the GMTK 2021 Jam.

Credits:

Surf Shimmy by Kevin MacLeod
